## R Markdown

|**Acute APAP Toxicity** \| \| **Symptoms** \| **Labs** \|

\|---------------------------\|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\|-------------------------------------------------\|

\| **Stage 1**: 0-24 hours \| N/V, diaphoresis, malaise May be asymptomatic \| Labs, PE generally normal \| \| **Stage 2**: 24-72 hours \| Initial symptoms resolve RUQ pain, liver enlargement/tenderness \| AST/ALT, ↑ PT/INR, renal dysfunction, ↑ amylase \| \| **Stage 3**: 72-96 hours \| N/V, diaphoresis return - Jaundice, hepatic encephalopathy, hyperammonemia, bleeding, hypoglycemia, lactic acidosis - Renal failure, multi organ failure, death \| LFTs peak \| \| **Stage 4**: 4-14 days \| Recovery phase Slow normalization of symptoms and lab values (Symptoms typically normalize well before transaminases do) \| Slow normalization \|
